STM32CubeWL3 Firmware Package V0.3.0 / 23-February-2024

Main Changes

Official Release of STM32CubeWL3 Firmware package supporting STM32WL33xx devices

Connectivity

- Not applicable

Drivers

- Support CMSIS version v5.9.0

- CMSIS Device Drivers supporting STM32WL33xx devices

- HAL/LL Drivers available for all peripherals

Middlewares

- Add FatFS and FreeRTOS

- Add Sigfox

Projects

- HAL/LL templates for IAR

- Add new projects for IAR

  • Examples
    • LPAWUR_Skeleton
    • MRSUBG_Skeleton
  • Demonstrations
    • LPAWUR_Skeleton
    • MRSUBG_Skeleton
  • Applications
    • Sigfox_Skeleton
